channel.title: Reggae
channel.description: How many of you are into reggae? I tend to lean towards some of the noncommercial, obscure stuff. I respect Bob Marley and all, but it was a mistake on his part by not protecting his music; now you hear it on the radio stations all the time. But if you do like reggae, please do post who you listen to. I'm kind of at a loss for New & Exciting people to listen to.

item.title: Reggae
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I can appreciate reggae, but I don’t listen to much/know many artists.

The dancehall/dub/ragga shit I can get into a lot more

Read full topic

item.title: Reggae
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

I have listened to two reggae songs, recommended by my friend: Wisin y Yandel - Rakata and Wisin y Yandel - Llame Para Verte. They’re good.
